$interpreted: : A few days later...
Surprised Soldier: S-Sir Ace! You're here again for inspection!?
Surprised Soldier: We're actually on an important mission, so unfortunately we have to go right now! Byeee~~!!
Nervous Guard: Hmph, these new recruits think they can just ignore Sir Aldric!? What gall!
Quiet Guard: They're usually so respectful, too... I can't believe they would just up and leave like that.
Ace: ...Something seems off.
Gossiping Rookie: Hey, did you guys hear? Wendel got punished for going after Sione!
Scared Soldier: Yeah, he's been ordered to pick weeds all day out in the hot sun!! I could barely survive that, let alone little Wendy Wendel.
Gossiping Rookie: I bet someone higher up the food chain made it happen. One of the nobles, you know... They're way more important than us nobodies.
Patrol Soldier: What are you doing out here lazing around!? Get back to your posts!!
Patrol Soldier: ...S-Sir Aldric!
Ace: It seems that as of late, discipline around here leaves much to be desired. Would you care explain yourself?
Patrol Soldier: One of our soldiers, Wendel, passed out from overwork. Once his little sister heard about it, she ran over here and raised a huge fuss.
Patrol Soldier: Now the whole camp is gossiping, I can't control it. Apologies, Sir Aldric...
Ace: Where is the captain?
Patrol Soldier: He is with Sione outside of the medical tent...
Ace: I'm going!
Rookie Captain: Wendel just wasn't up to our standards. We gave him some more work to try and whip him into shape!
Rookie Captain: You don't think I was just bullying him, do you?
Sione: No, but I do think the work given to him was far more than he could handle! It's hard not to think you were singling him out!
Rookie Captain: Sure I was singling him out, but with good intentions! Honestly, he's such a screw-up he should have been kicked out of here ages ago!
Ace: Who's getting kicked out?
Sione: Ace, what are you...
Ace: Sione...
Rookie Captain: Sir Aldric, you've come at a good time!
Rookie Captain: Your sister seems to be quite opinionated on the way we're dealing with Wendel.
Rookie Captain: But, and I've told her this, the camp must silence those who dare spread rumors! This is an army, not a circus!
Sione: And yet you're not punishing the ones who spread the rumors, you're punishing the victim!
Sione: I'm sorry, but that can't be army policy!
Ace: It seems to be your fault, captain, for not finding out the truth before taking action.
Ace: I will report this to the commander.
Rookie Captain: Sir Ace, you've misunderstood!
Rookie Captain: That idiot Wendel is like a frog that wants to be a prince! I'm just doing what's best for your sister!
Sione: ...For me?
Ace: I'll decide what's best for my sister, not you!
Rookie Captain: But, last time you came for inspection, I thought you hinted to me that you wanted Wendel taken care of...
Sione: Ace... did you!? Does this all have something to do with you!?
Sione: Brother... I've always wanted to be just like you. I've looked up to you...
Sione: You're strong, serious, and fight for what you believe in.
Sione: But to bully a completely innocent soldier... one who tries so hard... Brother, if you had something to do with this, I'll never forgive you!
Rookie Captain: S-Sione, your brother was only trying to protect---
Ace: ---Shut up.
Ace: Sione, you... you've never talked to me like that before.
Ace: And yet, doubting your own sibling without getting their side of the story first... Is that something you've learned from me?
Sione: I...

Model.Text: A few days later...
S-Sir Ace! You're here again for inspection!?
We're actually on an important mission, so unfortunately we have to go right now! Byeee~~!!
Hmph, these new recruits think they can just ignore Sir Aldric!? What gall!
They're usually so respectful, too... I can't believe they would just up and leave like that.
...Something seems off.
Hey, did you guys hear? Wendel got punished for going after Sione!
Yeah, he's been ordered to pick weeds all day out in the hot sun!! I could barely survive that, let alone little Wendy Wendel.
I bet someone higher up the food chain made it happen. One of the nobles, you know... They're way more important than us nobodies.
What are you doing out here lazing around!? Get back to your posts!!
...S-Sir Aldric!
It seems that as of late, discipline around here leaves much to be desired. Would you care explain yourself?
One of our soldiers, Wendel, passed out from overwork. Once his little sister heard about it, she ran over here and raised a huge fuss.
Now the whole camp is gossiping, I can't control it. Apologies, Sir Aldric...
Where is the captain?
He is with Sione outside of the medical tent...
I'm going!
Wendel just wasn't up to our standards. We gave him some more work to try and whip him into shape!
You don't think I was just bullying him, do you?
No, but I do think the work given to him was far more than he could handle! It's hard not to think you were singling him out!
Sure I was singling him out, but with good intentions! Honestly, he's such a screw-up he should have been kicked out of here ages ago!
Who's getting kicked out?
Ace, what are you...
Sione...
Sir Aldric, you've come at a good time!
Your sister seems to be quite opinionated on the way we're dealing with Wendel.
But, and I've told her this, the camp must silence those who dare spread rumors! This is an army, not a circus!
And yet you're not punishing the ones who spread the rumors, you're punishing the victim!
I'm sorry, but that can't be army policy!
It seems to be your fault, captain, for not finding out the truth before taking action.
I will report this to the commander.
Sir Ace, you've misunderstood!
That idiot Wendel is like a frog that wants to be a prince! I'm just doing what's best for your sister!
...For me?
I'll decide what's best for my sister, not you!
But, last time you came for inspection, I thought you hinted to me that you wanted Wendel taken care of...
Ace... did you!? Does this all have something to do with you!?
Brother... I've always wanted to be just like you. I've looked up to you...
You're strong, serious, and fight for what you believe in.
But to bully a completely innocent soldier... one who tries so hard... Brother, if you had something to do with this, I'll never forgive you!
S-Sione, your brother was only trying to protect---
---Shut up.
Sione, you... you've never talked to me like that before.
And yet, doubting your own sibling without getting their side of the story first... Is that something you've learned from me?
